resources.string: Water Tracker is an application designed to utilize crowd-sourced data to improve mapping of fresh water across the globe.
This app was developed by Robert Close, Matthew Thorne, Andrew Campbell, and Michael Gicking.
Water Tracker was developed over the weekend of April 11-12, 2015 as part of the NASA Space Apps Challenge.

Tap on the map to log a new observation.
Press and hold to change map view settings.
Tap on a marker to view/edit details.
Tap the target button to zoom to location.
Marker color key:
	Red: Wells
	Green: Springs
	Blue: Streams, lakes, rivers, etc.
	Yellow: Government Facility
For additional information, please visit our page at www.rkclose.com/NASASpaceApps
Additional questions or bug reports should be directed to salisburywatertracker@gmail.com
